column8:
$ open / use / go / take / go in / leave
check(locked)
move(ANY orientation)
column9:
$ unlock
check(NOT locked)
check(!p key>doorID, match, doorID)
disable(locked)
write(the door is now unlocked)
column10:
$ lock
check(locked)
check(!p key>doorID, match, doorID)
enable(locked)
write(the door is now locked)
